title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing spit in a dream

preview.html: Learn the interpretation of a dream about spitting. In reality, spitting is one of the disgusting things that is not accepted in any advanced society. Some people may see spitting in a dream and be surprised by this vision, which is actually something strange, and wonder whether this vision is good for them or whether it is something bad and disgusting as it happens in real life. To know the dimensions of this topic and all its details, you can follow this article to clarify the meaning of visions of spitting in dreams. The interpretation of a man’s dream of spitting on a strange woman indicates that the dreamer is taking advantage of his money. In order to fulfill some whims and unnecessary romantic adventures that are nothing but bad and wasted money, he must return to the path of justice and truth. If the spit in the dream is directed at the wall, it is one of the beautiful things that everything is fine for the dreamer and his family, as it means that The man will buy land that he dreamed of owning. In order to build on it. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, there is an Egyptian Google website specializing in dream interpretation. What is the interpretation of a dream about spitting? If this spray is spread on the wife, it means love, closeness, a relationship, and a sacrifice for her with everything she has. Because it is a life partner and a companion on the road. Spitting on a street corner in a dream is interpreted as a lot of money that a person has and seeks to spend it on everything good, which makes him have many good deeds for which God will reward him. This vision could also be close. Of recovery from problems and diseases, and sometimes it is a sign of not fulfilling promises made, which is a very bad thing. Interpretation of a dream about spitting for a married woman: It is interpreted as happiness in married life, great family happiness, and a lot of money to spend on everything that makes her happy and livelihood represented by good children Interpretation of a dream about spitting in the house: If a woman spits in the house where she and her family live, this is evidence of her great cooperation with her husband in the expenses of the house and children, and this cooperation is moral and material through her own money that she shares with her. Her family. If the vision involves the wife spitting on the husband, it is an indication of this wife’s own money with which she helps the husband and finds benefits and a material connection in it, and this money may come from work or a job that the wife does. He makes it for her or inherits it.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing amulets in a dream and their interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing amulets in a dream. Amulets are those that sorcerers and charlatans use to harm a person. Some people who want to harm others resort to sorcerers and seeing hieroglyphs in a dream are not good visions. This is what makes those who dream of them look for an interpretation. They dream of seeing amulets in a dream. A dream, and on the contrary, the decoding of these talismans is one of the good things in the dream that pleases the owner of the vision. Interpretation of magic talismansThe dream interpretation scholar, Imam Ibn Sirin, believes that amulets in a dream indicate harm and things that are not good for the one who sees the vision, as well as: If a person sees in a dream decoding amulets, this indicates his ability to make the right decision. If a person sees in a dream that he is writing amulets, this indicates that there are mistakes in his life that he has made. Dream interpretation scholars believe that anyone who sees himself pronouncing amulets is a sign of... Bad things happen to the dreamer. If he sees a magician decoding amulets, this is a sign of his travels soon. Also, seeing amulets in a dream can indicate the presence of sins and sins committed by the dreamer. Some dream interpretation scholars believe that anyone who sees himself in a dream and has become a magician is... A sign that he is getting close to the rulers, lying and using magic amulets. Canceling magic in a dream indicates a return to God, repentance, and getting rid of the problems in life. Seeing amulets and writing them on white paper in poor handwriting indicates the presence of problems in the life of the dreamer. If Her handwriting is beautiful, so this is a sign of good news that the dreamer will hear. Or it may indicate that his life has changed for the better. It also indicates his readiness for his problems and concerns. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a magician in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of magic spells in a dream for a man. When a man sees spells in a dream Magically, it shows many clues related to his life and situation, and these clues are: If he sees himself burning amulets in a dream, this is a sign that his life will change for the better. But if he sees amulets on his body, this indicates the presence of many enemies around him. If he sees himself burning Symbols of magic spells, as this indicates that he performs very good deeds. See also: Dreams that show magic and symbols of magic in a dream. Interpretation of seeing amulets in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a single girl wearing amulets in a dream has many indicators, according to the details of the dream, and among the indications associated with seeing amulets In the dream of an unmarried girl: If she sees in her dream that someone is giving her amulets written on money, this is a sign of abundant sustenance and a lot of money. And if she sees herself repenting from the amulets, and turning away from magic and sorcery, this indicates that she will be freed from her worries and troubles. As for Deciphering talismans in a dream is an indication of their distance from sins and transgressions. And if he deciphers talismans in a dream, this indicates his good morals. In addition, if she sees herself unconscious and affected by amulets, then this

title: What is the interpretation of seeing princes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing princes in a dream: Princes are the ones who preside over the country, rule it, and make the right decisions for the benefit of the citizens so that they can move forward in their lives and live in a better way. The ruler refers to the power, influence, and authority that he enjoys. There are many interpretations that vary from one case to another depending on the situation of the viewer, and in the following article we will explain all the cases and their interpretations in detail: Seeing princes in a dream. The interpretation of seeing princes in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will receive a promotion in his workplace or Obtaining another job that is better than the current job and suitable for him. Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing the deceased king in a dream indicates that the dreamer has good morals and his love for helping those in need and standing by their side. Seeing princes in a dream by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing princes in a dream as An indication of one's high status in the vision and one's ability to fulfill all one's desires. If the dreamer sees in his dream the ruler of a country other than his own, this indicates that he will have a travel opportunity from which he will earn a lot of money. Seeing a prince in a dream is a sign that the owner of the vision will Able to defeat his enemies and gain victory over them. The dreamer dreams of an angel coming to him in a dream, and he was beautiful, symbolizing the goodness of his subjects and managing their affairs well. Seeing the prince in a dream, who is in a bad condition, indicates his weakness, his failure to successfully lead the country’s affairs, and the victory of his enemies over him. And the lack of highly skilled soldiers. Seeing princes in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi mentioned that seeing princes in a dream is a sign of weakness near God and obtaining good and ample sustenance. Seeing a prince in a dream being expelled from his position is a sign that the person with the vision will lose his job or lose A lot of money. If the dreamer is in need of money and sees a ruler in his dream, this indicates an improvement in his financial situation and a change in his life for the better. The dreamer seeing a prince in his dream and taking the crown off his head indicates that the visionary does not care about his external appearance or his actions and their impact on others, and it He could be an unjust person. To his parents or misbehave with his brothers. Seeing princes in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl, the prince, in a dream, wearing white clothes, indicates the approaching date of her marriage to a person of good character and high status in society. For a girl to see in her dream that the Sultan offers Her golden ring is a sign of a young man who will propose to her in the near future. If the dreamer sees that she is meeting the ruler of a country other than the country in which she resides, this indicates her marriage to a person from a country other than her own, and she will likely travel home with him. In the event that The dream of a fortuneteller, the prince who helps her eat, whether it is honey or grapes, symbolizes that she will receive more good things and the livelihood that she will earn in her life. Seeing a girl sleeping when the Sultan gives her roses, which indicates her marriage to a brave and attractive person. And the dream The fortuneteller's obedience to the ruling council is a sign of h

title: Interpretation of seeing apples in a dream and peeling them in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing apples in a dream and peeling them in a dream. Apples are very delicious and useful fruits that are loved by adults and children, but apples in a dream taste the same sweetness as in life or not. Read more about the interpretation of seeing apples in a dream in the article below. Watch eating red apples in a dreamfrom He sees that he is eating a lot of red apples in a dream, this means, and God knows that a person tells a lot of lies in hadiths. But if he sees a girl who is either single, married, or pregnant eating apples, it means that she wants a man other than her husband or the presence of adultery. Interpretation of drinking apple juice in Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking apple juice, this means that he is arrogant and arrogant in this world. As for whoever sees apple peels in his dream, the dream indicates the presence of an evil, disobedient, and disobedient woman in his life. Whoever dreams of throwing apples in the presence of a ruler, president, or man in an important position, this means that all... The dreams and desires of the sleeper will come true. Interpretation of the vision of cutting apples: Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting apples, this means that the sleeper is giving his money to those in need. Whoever sees in his dream that he was injured while cutting apples, this means, according to the interpretation of the dream, that he is suffering from sadness, delusion, and severe distress. As for the one who saw That he cuts apples and peels them for himself, it means that he will discover something or a secret in someone. To see an apple tree in a dream If a pregnant woman dreams of an apple tree, this means that she will give birth to good offspring and that her due date is very close. And whoever dreams that he plants or grows an apple tree in On the ground, this means that he will sponsor an orphan. As for the one who dreams, he dreams of picking apples. It is clear from the tree that the sleeper will receive very abundant money from his acquaintances, which is a great service to the person. As for the one who is seen picking apples from the tree, according to Ibn Shirin, this means that the sleeper will be expelled from his place because of the apple incident. With our master Adam and Eve. As for the one who dreams of licking an apple, this alone indicates that sleep will soon gain its strength and benefits. Interpretation of seeing an apple in a dream. And whoever dreams of smelling apples, this indicates the approaching marriage, whether the sleeper is a man or a woman. And if the woman smells the scent of apples in the mosque, this Evidence of a woman’s piety and righteousness. But if she smells apples in front of people, this is a sign that the woman will soon become famous. We have explained to you a number of interpretations of seeing apples, an apple tree, or cutting and peeling apples in a dream from interpretations by experienced dream interpretation scholars.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite at the foot of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on their leg. What are the exact signs of seeing a black snake bite on their leg? Are interpretations of a snake bite or a white snake on its leg bad or not? What did investigators and officials say about the large snake bite on her leg? Find out the details and interpretations of the vision in the article below. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for the dream interpretation website on the Internet. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on his leg. A snake bite on his leg in a dream indicates a distortion in the dreamer’s actions and behaviors in reality, which means that he is a lustful person. And he follows his demonic desires. Seeing a large snake bite on her leg indicates a great sin and a great sin committed by the dreamer, such as murder, adultery, and forbidden money. A snake bite on the dreamer’s foot or leg without feeling pain leads to problems that the dreamer faces and can solve in waking life. To dream that you You may be bitten by a snake and for you to scream loudly in a dream is evidence of a strong crisis that is difficult for the dreamer to resolve and that will destroy his life. If the dreamer sees in a dream a large snake biting him on his leg or foot and cries profusely throughout the vision because he suffered from the bite, this indicates a serious financial problem that the dreamer will face. In the near future.Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite at Ibn Sirin’s foot. The symbol of a snake or snake bite in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates evil, conspiracy, and harm. If the dreamer sees a snake staring at him and wants to bite him on the leg, but he escapes from it and is able to save himself from harm in the dream, The vision indicates that the dreamer maintains his religion and practices his worship, as he is far from those with dirty morals and weak souls in reality. If the dreamer sees a large snake that was able to bite his leg in a dream, and he sees that its long fangs have completely entered the leg and he feels dizziness and pain in his body as if Dying and preparing for death, then the only thing seen in this vision is evidence of extreme anguish and strong machinations that the dreamer falls into and is hurt because of. Interpretation of dreams of a snake bite on the leg for single womenIf a single religious woman sees a black snake biting her legs in a dream, this scene warns her of Human demons, where she is watched by someone who mistreats her because of her strong relationship with God and will harm her and make her stop worshiping. And God is carried away by pleasures. If an unmarried employee sees a huge snake in the workplace wrapping around her legs and hitting her hard in a dream, this is interpreted by someone from work who hates her and wants to spoil her career and may plan it soon, or ruin it. Her reputation among her colleagues. When an unmarried woman can protect her legs from snake bites in a dream, this indicates that she is very careful and does not allow anyone to cross her limits and harm her in her personal or professional life. Dream interpretation of a snake bite on the right leg of an unmarried womanIf the dreamer sees A white snake bites him on his right leg in a dream, then this is interpreted by a woman of her acquaintances or relatives who hate the dreamer and could harm her severely in life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about calling to prayer on the road

preview.html: The dream interpretation of the call to prayer in the street is one of the things that gives a person a sense of security and security, as it makes him feel the call of God Almighty to him and tells him that the time has come to meet him. Through praying to God, and it is certain that the dream of calling to prayer on the road has many interpretations and interpretations mentioned by scholars, which we will present to you today through this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of the dream of the call to prayer on the path of Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the call to prayer in a dream carries many indications. Some of them are good and some of them portend the emergence of many evils, such as: Good indicators of a dream about calling to prayer on the road: In the opinion of Ibn Sirin, regarding the call to prayer in a dream, this is a sign that Hajj will take place soon, God willing, especially if the dream is during the months of Hajj. Sometimes it is Hajj. In a dream, it is a sign that the dreamer will obtain a great position or high status. If the dreamer is single, then seeing him is a sign of marriage, God willing, to a girl devoted to religion and chastity. Seeing the muezzin in a dream is a sign of the presence of someone calling on the fortuneteller to do good, or it may be a sign For the muezzin to marry him in reality. As for whoever finds in a dream that he is calling the call to prayer in one of the minarets, this is good news that he will assume the guardianship of some people or a sign of the great gains that he will obtain. It may also be a sign of his salvation from the whispers of Satan. The call to prayer in a dream is good news for the dreamer that he will do good and commit to obeying God and perform worship to the fullest, and that he will also seek God’s satisfaction and forgiveness. Whoever finds himself in a place full of corruption and devastation, but he is called to prayer This is a sign that he will rebuild this place and repair it, and call on the people of the place to follow truth and goodness. As for the one who finds himself calling people and does not remember the call to prayer, or finds it difficult to remember, this is a sign of his enemies’ victory over him. Bad connotations of a dream about the call to prayer on the road: A dream about calling to prayer in the street could be an indication of great evil that will befall the dreamer, as he may be subjected to theft or gossip, if the call is in the opposite direction of the trend. Of prayer. Seeing a woman giving the call to prayer in a dream indicates the spread of heresies and temptations in the country. But if the caller in the dream is a young child, this is a sign of the condition of a person who is not suitable for the affairs of the country. And whoever is found calling the call to a well, this is a sign that he is one of Spies, or it may be characterized by spreading heresies and misguidance among people. If the fortuneteller reads the call to prayer in a different way or mentions a stranger, this is an unpleasant vision, because it is a sign of contempt for religion, or a warning from God that one should be careful because the priest may be. They suffer from great injustice from people. If the dreamer sees that he is making a call on the roof of a house, then his dream does not bode well at all, because it is a sign of the death of the owners of that house. And whoever calls for prayer from above the Sacred House of God, this is a warning sign that he will follow many heresies. And he follows the path of misguidance, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about ears on the road for single, pregnant and married women: Interpretation
preview.text: The interpretation of a dream about being called to prayer in the street is one of the things that gives a person a sense of security and safety, as it makes him feel that God Almighty is calling him and telling him that the time has come to meet Him. Through prayer to God, and certainly the dream of calling on the road has many interpretations and explanations mentioned by scholars, which we will present to you today through this article in the Encyclopedia. Interpretation of the dream of the call to prayer on the road of Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the call to prayer in a dream carries many indications, some of which are good and some of which portend the emergence of many evils, such as: Good indications for the dream of the call to prayer on the road: In Ibn Sirin’s opinion, the call to prayer in a dream is a sign that the Hajj will take place soon, God willing, especially if the dream is in the months of Hajj. Sometimes Hajj in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will obtain a great position or a high status. If the dreamer is single, then his vision is a sign of marriage, God willing, to a girl devoted to religion and chastity. Seeing the muezzin in a dream is a sign of the presence of someone calling the fortuneteller to do good, or it may be a sign for the muezzin to marry him in reality. As for the one who finds in a dream that he is calling the call to prayer in one of the minarets, this is good news in his assumption of the guardianship of some people or a sign of the great gains that he will obtain. It may also be a sign of his deliverance from the whispers of Satan. The call to prayer in a dream is good news for the dreamer that he will do good and adhere to obeying God and perform worship in the best possible way, and that he will also seek God’s pleasure and forgiveness. Whoever finds himself in a place full of corruption and ruin, but he calls for prayer, this is a sign that he will rebuild and repair this place, and call the people of the place to follow the truth and goodness. As for whoever finds that he is calling people and does not remember the call to prayer, or finds it difficult to remember, this is a sign of the victory of his enemies over him. Bad indications of a dream about the call to prayer on the road: A dream about the call to prayer in the street can be an indication of the great evil that will befall the dreamer, as he may be exposed to theft or gossip, if the call is in the opposite direction. From prayer. Seeing a woman calling to prayer in a dream indicates the spread of heresies and temptations in the country. If the caller in the dream is a young child, this is a sign of the state of a person who is not suitable for the affairs of the country. And whoever finds that he is calling to a well, this is a sign that he is a spy, or that he may be characterized by spreading heresies and misguidance among people. If the fortune teller reads the call to prayer in a different way or mentions a stranger, this is an unpleasant vision, because it is a sign of contempt for religion, or a warning from God to be careful because the priest may suffer from great injustice from people. If the dreamer sees that he is calling on the roof of a house, his dream does not bode well at all, because it is a sign of the death of the owners of that house. And whoever calls to prayer from the top of the Sacred House of God, this is a warning sign that he will follow many heresies and walk the path of misguidance, God forbid. Interpretation of a dream about the call to prayer on the road for single, pregnant and married women: Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream, interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin on the Mohazat website. Here is the interpretation of long hair in a dream. Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream. Long hair in a dream is generally evidence of goodness, health, and longevity. It is an abundance of food and money, and also a sign of distinction and creativity, as it indicates honesty and deep sincerity. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin, mentioned by the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing in a dream has many meanings and connotations for long hair. It has been mentioned that whoever sees in a dream that his hair is long and black, this indicates the arrival of good and abundant money to the person with this insight. . While whoever sees that his hair is long, soft, and soft, this indicates good health. If he is sick, he will recover and get rid of his illness. As for whoever sees his hair long and curly, this symbolizes the presence of some problems, disagreements, and complicated matters in his life, and that he will overcome some disturbances and confusion, while whoever sees That his hair has changed to long hair like that of a horse, this indicates that the secret he is keeping will be revealed, and if he is sick, he will die. Read also: Interpretation of drinking alcohol in a dream. Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for a single woman. As for an unmarried girl who sees her hair very long in her dream, this indicates that she She carries confidence with her and she will keep it, because it indicates her long life and that there is great happiness that she will live with. Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for a married woman: If the woman is married and sees long hair in her dream, this means that she will become pregnant if she is barren, and it also indicates the remaining affection and love between her and her. Her partner.Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for a woman who sees that her hair is long during her pregnancy, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy.

title: Dreaming of visiting orphans in a dream

preview.html: A dream about visiting orphans by Ibn Sirinizor Orphans in a dream Adopting an orphan child is evidence of freedom from problems and worries. But if he sees in a dream that he is adopting an orphan he does not know, this indicates good deeds that the dreamer is doing. Seeing an unknown orphan child in a dream is a sign of poverty and the desire for money. Seeing an orphan girl in a dream shows a woman’s love for her husband in reality. Interpretation of seeing orphans visiting Nabulsi. Nabulsi sees that seeing orphans in a dream is evidence of oppression and injustice to which the dreamer is exposed. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has been left an orphan, this indicates the death of a member of his family. Adopting orphan children in a dream is a sign of good circumstances and a change in life for the better. Orphans dream in one dream. An unmarried girl who dreams of a crying orphan child indicates a delay in marriage. As for seeing an orphan child, this indicates that he will soon marry someone he loves very much. If he sees that he is adopting If an orphan, this indicates that he will be close to the person he loves. Interpretation of seeing orphans for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of adopting an orphan child, this indicates the stability of her marital life. As for seeing orphans in happiness and joy, this indicates a great deal of sustenance and a lot of goodness. Seeing a sad orphan child in a dream indicates the problems and fears that this girl is in. Seeing orphans dreams of a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a sick orphan in a dream, this indicates a difficult birth. Seeing an orphan happy and cheerful, this indicates nourishment for the male child. Seeing orphans happy indicates Also to the good news that you will hear soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing orphans for a man: A man dreams in a dream that he is adopting a child, this indicates the end of troubles and relief from worries. Orphans cry in a dream from unpleasant visions. See security An orphan in a dream is one of the good visions because it indicates wealth and goodness Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing weight gain in a dream

preview.html: Weight gain in a dream: Weight gain is one of the dangers that many people suffer from. It is one of the bad things that occurs as a result of malnutrition, non-compliance with eating, and overeating, which exposes you to many problems and chronic diseases. That, and in this article, we consider together the most important things that commentators said about these visions. Gaining weight in a dream. Jurists say that the interpretation of a dream about gaining weight varies depending on its characteristics, as it depends on the extent of the gain, whether natural or obesity, and we talk about it as follows: If the dreamer sees that He has gained weight naturally in the dream, then this is a sign of God’s protection and care for him. If the sleeper sees that he has gained excessive weight, this indicates that he will obtain many good and great benefits in his life. And if a woman dreams that she has gained weight, this means that she enjoys By understanding religion, looking at all its matters, and doing many good deeds. Scientists have also indicated that gaining weight in a dream leads to an expansion of the diet and happiness experienced by the dreamer. But if an unmarried girl sees that her weight is increasing in her dream, this will lead to amazing success. She excels in all the affairs of her life. When the dreamer steps on the scale and sees that her weight has increased, this means that she enjoys a high status and the appreciation of her family. If a young man sees in his dream that his weight has exceeded the permissible limit in the dream, this indicates that he will receive a lot of nutrition. Dream Interpretation SecretsThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access, write a page on the Internet Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams on Google. Weight gain in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that seeing an unmarried girl gaining weight in a dream indicates excellence, success, and progress in all areas of her life. If the dreamer sees that his weight has increased, his situation will improve. And his situation will change for the better. When the dreamer sees that she is stepping on the scale to find out her weight, and sees that it is increasing, this indicates the high position that she will reach and that people will appreciate. If the merchant sees that he has gained weight, this portends to him the material gains and profits that he will gain in the near future. A young man who is studying and sees that he is overweight, this symbolizes the achievement of his goals and he will excel in all his affairs. Weight gain in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Shaheen believes that if an unmarried girl sees that her weight has increased in a dream, this means that she will gain a lot of livelihood and gain Many blessings. If the girl is already underweight and sees that her weight has increased, this means that she will make a lot of money from a project she is undertaking. If the dreamer works in a specific job and sees that his weight has increased, this foretells that he will occupy the highest positions after promotion. When a girl sees in her dream that she is overweight, this means that she is exposed to some problems and crises, but she has the ability to overcome them. And if the girl sees herself in
